response.overview: Kelvin is assigned to deliver a briefcase full of money on a mission that seems simple at first. Accompanied by his two companions, Petra and Amon, their journey turns into a game full of intrigue. As greed and betrayal begin to erode the trust between them, Amon tries to seize the briefcase. The dynamics among them keep shifting, until it is finally revealed that this mission is more than just about money, with deadly consequences that were planned from the very beginning.
response.title: Anatomy of a Courier
